attributes.action: Allow the whole of the UK to have Christmas Day
attributes.additional_details:
This year has been one of the worst years and Christmas Day has been the only positive getting people through.  To now have that taken away is heartbreaking and has left a lot of people who are already struggling with this situation in an even worse position with nothing positive to look forward.

Give those in the South-East and London one day to enjoy!
attributes.background: Allow those now stuck in tier 4 to spend Christmas Day with their loved ones as planned and only the 25th December.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564312
